Package SampleCombiDevice

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposBaseDevice
      • de.gmxhome.conrad.jpos.jpos_base.JposDevice
        • SampleCombiDevice.Device
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class Device
extends JposDevice
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Implementation of a JposDevice based implementation of a combined driver that becomes several JavaPOS device service in combination with the JposXxxx class in jpos_base

      Helper class that stores MSR track data.

      • MaxRetry

        int MaxRetry
        Jpos.xml property MaxRetry specifies the maximum number of retries. Should be > 0 only for RS232 (real COM ports) where characters can become lost or corrupted on the communication line.

      • InIOError

        boolean InIOError
        Flag showing the driver is in I/O error state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Device

        public Device​(java.lang.String port)
       throws jpos.JposException
        Constructor, Stores communication target. Communication target can be a COM port or a TCP target. Valid COM port specifiers differ between operating systems, e.g. on Windows, COM1 can be a valid communication target while on Linux, /dev/ttyS0 might specify the same target. Format of TCP targets is IpAddress:Port, e.g. 10.11.12.13:45678.
        Parameters:
        port - COM port or TCP target.
        Throws:
        jpos.JposException - if Communication target invalid.

      • sendCommand

        protected java.lang.Byte sendCommand​(byte[] request,
                                     byte responseType)
                              throws jpos.JposException
        Method to perform any command
        Parameters:
        request - Data to be sent
        responseType - type of response frame (first byte)
        Returns:
        null on timeout, Byte(responseType) on success
        Throws:
        jpos.JposException - in error case

      • changeOpenCount

        int changeOpenCount​(int value)

      • updateKeylockStates

        void updateKeylockStates​(JposCommonProperties dev,
                         boolean enable)
                  throws jpos.JposException
        Updates keyposition or electronic key value, depending on the lock type: The first Keylock is a central lock with positions 0, I, II, X, Z, P and T, the second Keylock is for electronic keys with 48-bit values (all bits 0 means no key present).
        Parameters:
        dev - Property set
        enable - True if DeviceEnabled will be set.
        Throws:
        jpos.JposException - If current Keylock position is invalid.

      • updateDrawerStates

        void updateDrawerStates​(CashDrawerProperties dev,
                        boolean enable)
        Updates DrawerOpen property while setting DeviceEnabled.
        Parameters:
        dev - Property set
        enable - True if DeviceEnabled will be set.

      • updateCommonStates

        void updateCommonStates​(JposCommonProperties dev,
                        boolean enable)
        Updates PowerState property if power notifications are enabled while setting DeviceEnabled to true.
        Parameters:
        dev - Property set
        enable - True if DeviceEnabled will be set.

      • startCommunication

        void startCommunication()
        Increments open count. If incremented to 1, starts communication handler.

      • stopCommunication

        void stopCommunication()
        Decrements open count. If decremented to 0, stops communication handler.

      • internalCheckHealth

        boolean internalCheckHealth​(JposCommonProperties dev,
                            int level)
        Performs internal CheckHealth, equal processing for all device classes.
        Parameters:
        dev - Property set to be used.
        level - CheckHealth level parameter.
        Returns:
        true if level = CH_INTERNAL.

      • timeoutToLong

        long timeoutToLong​(int timeout)
        Converts timeout value to long.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout as integer value.
        Returns:
        For positive values, timeout. For JPOS_FOREVER -1. Otherwise 2 * (Integer.MAX_VALUE + 1) + timeout.
